product.name: Pumpkin Spice Coffee
product.description: Enjoy the rich, warm flavors of fall in every sip with our seasonal Pumpkin Spice Coffee. Made with real pumpkin puree and a blend of spices, it's the perfect treat for chilly autumn mornings.

product.name: Coffee Croissant Combo
product.description: Start your day off right with our Coffee Croissant Combo. Our freshly brewed coffee paired with a flaky, buttery croissant is the ultimate breakfast experience.

product.name: Lemon Ginger Tea
product.description: Refresh and revitalize with our Lemon Ginger Tea. This tea is made with real lemon pieces and spicy ginger to give you a zesty and invigorating experience.

product.name: Lemon Honey Tea
product.description: Treat yourself to a sweet and soothing cup of Lemon Honey Tea. Made with real lemon pieces and honey, it's the perfect way to unwind after a long day.

product.name: Croissant
product.description: Indulge in the classic French treat, the Croissant. Made with flaky, buttery layers, it's the perfect snack to enjoy with a cup of coffee.

product.name: Triple Chocolate Muffin
product.description: Satisfy your sweet tooth with our Triple Chocolate Muffin. Made with rich, dark chocolate, it's a chocolate lover's dream come true.

product.name: French Bread Loaf
product.description: Enjoy the taste of freshly baked French Bread right at home. Perfect for toasting or making sandwiches, it's a staple in every kitchen.

product.name: Pastries
product.description: Indulge in a variety of sweet treats with our Pastries. From fruit tarts to cream puffs, there's something for everyone.

product.name: Cinnamon Caramel Latte
product.description: Satisfy your sweet tooth with our Cinnamon Caramel Latte. Made with rich caramel and a touch of cinnamon, it's the perfect indulgence for any time of day.

product.name: Organic Black Coffee
product.description: Savor the bold and rich flavor of our Organic Black Coffee. Made with 100% Arabica beans, it's the perfect choice for coffee purists.
